content.question: Which of the following ethical considerations is typically raised by research on conformity?

choices.label: It is typically not possible to debrief participants in this type of study.
Participants often cannot be told the true purpose at the start of the study.
Institutional Review Boards will not approve research that studies conformity.
Confidentiality of data from individual participants cannot be ensured with this type of study.

content.answer: Participants often cannot be told the true purpose at the start of the study.

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
